description: white; desk-style; rectangular with flat top surface; clear plastic semi-circular portion that wraps around front with neon tube below in same shape; white cord; separate telephone cord; separate black wall plug
dimension: 3 x 8 3/4 x 6 1/2 in. (7.62 x 22.23 x 16.51 cm) (without cord)
medium: Thermoplastic casing, neon tubing, electronic components
text: Built-in neon lighting (available in several colors) was the added attraction to this low-profile telephone.  It served as a night light which would flash automatically with an incoming call giving it an other-worldly, space-age aura.
title: "Alexis" neon push-button telephone
